Text:
Quality torrent with a good seed.  Everything is included.

The production is from 2005, and you can see previews on lynda.com.  The guy is sleep-inducing, but if you can get through the series, you will learn a lot.

That said, I learned almost as much from these couple short videos.
Fireworks layers:
http://www.adobe.com/designcenter/video_workshop/?id=vid0169

Creating and finding color matches:
http://www.adobe.com/designcenter/video_workshop/?id=vid0058
